    • Uses of OTSender in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulation

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulation that implement OTSender 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTFullSimDDHOnByteArraySender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation.
      class  OTFullSimDDHOnGroupElementSender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation.

    • Uses of OTSender in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulationROM

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulationROM that implement OTSender 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTFullSimROMDDHOnByteArraySender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation in the random oracle model.
      class  OTFullSimROMDDHOnGroupElementSender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation in the random oracle model.

    • Uses of OTSender in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.oneSidedSimulation

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.oneSidedSimulation that implement OTSender 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTOneSidedSimDDHOnByteArraySender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves privacy for the case that the sender is corrupted and simulation in the case that the receiver is corrupted.
      class  OTOneSidedSimDDHOnGroupElementSender
      Concrete implementation of the sender side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves privacy for the case that the sender is corrupted and simulation in the case that the receiver is corrupted.

    • Uses of OTSender in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.privacyOnly

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.privacyOnly that implement OTSender 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTPrivacyOnlyDDHOnByteArraySender
      Concrete class for OT Privacy assuming DDH sender ON BYTE ARRAY.
      class  OTPrivacyOnlyDDHOnGroupElementSender
      Concrete class for OT Privacy assuming DDH sender ON GroupElement.

    • Uses of OTSender in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.semiHonest

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.semiHonest that implement OTSender 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTSemiHonestDDHOnByteArraySender
      Concrete class for Semi-Honest OT assuming DDH sender ON BYTE ARRAY.
      class  OTSemiHonestDDHOnGroupElementSender
      Concrete class for Semi-Honest OT assuming DDH sender ON GROUP ELEMENT.

    • Uses of OTSender in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.uc

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.uc that implement OTSender 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTUCDDHOnByteArraySender
      Concrete class for OT sender based on the DDH assumption that achieves UC security in the common reference string model.
      class  OTUCDDHOnGroupElementSender
      Concrete class for OT sender based on the DDH assumption that achieves UC security in the common reference string model.
